channel.title: External highscore hosting
channel.description:
Hello, I've done the highscore tutorial but that only supports internal hosting. Can any1 tell me how I can make it work on my external webhost?
The site with the highscores is: http://www.thomasdomein.nl/yoshi-scape/highscores/skills.php
I've added the database to phpmyadmin.

item.title: External highscore hosting
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
